snippet: The more rapid and ill-judged the pressure of despotism, the more sudden the recoil. In Germany, especially, the violence of the present action is a fair reason for hoping a speedy re-action and revolution. Every steamer brings additional proofs o...
lead_paragraph: The more rapid and ill-judged the pressure of despotism, the more sudden the recoil. In Germany, especially, the violence of the present action is a fair reason for hoping a speedy re-action and revolution. Every steamer brings additional proofs of insanity, of heaven-inflicted insanity, on the part of the rulers.
